idea:
eSkinDoctor Heathtech Pvt. Ltd leverages technology to enhance convenience, efficiency and accuracy of dermatology outcomes thereby improving the quality of life of patients. eSkinDoctor brings together advancements in Artificial Intelligence & Deep Learning with robust domain expertise in dermatology, to guide patients to qualified doctors, avoiding patient delays and avoidable complications arising out of delays


The company is founded by three highly experienced professionals with a combined experience of over 60 years in Technology, Artificial Intelligence, Sales & Marketing, Human Behavior and Entrepreneurship. The team also has tremendous experience working in the healthcare sector (private enterprise as well as public health) in India and international geographies.
name: eSkinDoctor HealthTech Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
OBJECTIVE OF CEES

`Provide solutions to the problem statement in Preface through bringing in the world class technologies with innovative products manufactured as import substitutes under Make in India drive utilizing Indian workforce thereby making Indian process industry revive against Chinese invasion in Chemical , textile & pharmaceutical industry besides OPEX driven exercise in energy guzzling industry Oil & Gas’.

 

With the depleting ground water and focus on the infrastructural growth, a contradictory scenario is emerging in India. Government of India is tackling the problem by restricting each industry by various measures to control the water consumption. The heat recovery through plate heat exchanger is a one solution. Air-cooled steam condensers and process condensers are added advantage to CEES product range. CEES therefore is in a unique position to offer the solution to such stressed conditions where ground water is below 10 meters and pressure from the government bodies is immense.

 

CEES has studied all solutions and tested them in the field while team being part of the critical equipment supplier. Having experienced and grown confident in providing `result oriented’ solution CEES has identified the market potential with fully networked sales and engineering team. CEES has full knowledge of property modelling, process synthesis , design , engineering, manufacturing and installation/commissioning of the successful solution.
name: CLEAN EARTH ENERGY SOLUTION INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Coulomb in into tech development and manufacturing of lithium battery. We are a tech product company and are products include lithium batteries, battery management systems, chargers and online tech platform for battery monitoring and data analytics
name: Coulomb Litech Pvt Ltd

name: j health care and safety

idea: ListenUp is essentially a Music Streaming Mobile application. The general idea of this app, as it differed from other music streaming apps, is that here each user of the app has to pay a minimum monthly subscription fee to the app and can subscribe to 5 artists in return. The listener/user can subscribe to more artists by paying more fees. This subscription fee, after payment gateway and maintenance charges will be directly deposited in the artists' bank account. Any user who has subscribed to minimum 5 artist can become an Artist on this platform and upload his/her songs, by filling a simple form. While uploading he/she has to pay an upload fee. This application will not contain any kind of advertisement and will not be containing any bollywood songs which are released on other platforms. It is an open platform which can be used by anyone. All the music in this app would be independent of bollywood, Hollywood or any such music copyrighted by any other music label or company. This app also won't consist any cover songs. An artist can upload any number of songs, that he or she has himself or herself composed or produced. This app mainly aims at generating a regular and monthly income to independent musicians, and empower them to compete with any higher middle class job working citizen.
name: ListenUp
